name: Those Days
description:
Luke wasn’t the sort of person I’d usually befriend. It was one of those friendships that just happened. Before long we were inseparable.

But, as I grew older, things changed. And I didn't see Luke again. Not for a while, at least.

Those Days is a character-driven interactive fiction piece about childhood memories, forgotten friendships and emotional health. It was first published as part of the 2021 Spring Thing Festival of Interactive Fiction.
